prompts.prompt: Get today's sunrise and sunset times for latitude {latitude} and longitude {longitude}.

template.name: get-today-sunrise-sunset
template.title: Get today's sunrise and sunset
template.description: Fetches today's sunrise and sunset times for the specified coordinates (UTC).

prompts.prompt: Get the sunrise and sunset times for latitude {latitude}, longitude {longitude} on date {date}.

template.name: get-sunrise-sunset-on-date
template.title: Get sunrise and sunset for a specific date
template.description: Fetches sunrise and sunset times for the given coordinates and date (UTC). Date format: yyyy-mm-dd.

prompts.prompt: Show the sunrise, sunset, and twilight times in ISO8601 format for latitude {latitude}, longitude {longitude}, on date {date}.

template.name: get-iso8601-sun-times
template.title: Get sunrise, sunset, and twilight in ISO8601
template.description: Returns all sun/twilight times for the given coordinates and date in ISO8601 time format (UTC).

prompts.prompt: Get today's sunrise and sunset times for my location.

template.name: get-today-sunrise-sunset-context
template.title: Get today's sunrise and sunset for current location
template.description: Fetches today's sunrise and sunset times using the current location from user context. Latitude and longitude are inferred, not provided as arguments.
